```{r setup}
library(biocentral)
```

# DNA-RNA
insert your input DNA sequence which must be multiples of three. Here we use random DNA sequence for example.
```{r}
DNAseq <- createdna(30)
RNAseq <- dna_to_rna(DNAseq)
RNAseq
```

# RNA-Amino Acid
insert your input RNA sequence which must be multiples of three. Here we use random RNA sequence for example.
```{r}
aa <- codon2amino(codon_start(RNAseq))
aa
```
